abstract.t: Versioning and configuration management are important features for ontrolling the evolution of remotely authored Web content. Parallel development leverages versioning capability to allow multiple authors to simultaneously author Web content. These functions form a basis for flexible, scaleable distributed authoring. This document describes a set of scenarios, functional, and non-functional requirements for web versioning extensions to the WebDAV protocol. It supersedes the versioning-related goals of [WEBDAV-GOALS].
